title: S1, E4: Are My Kids on Track: Emotional Milestone Empathy

itunes:subtitle: In this episode we talk about what empathy looks like, why it’s lacking, the stumbling blocks for empathy along with a close up look at narcissism and how to build more empathy in your kid.This episode is a companion to chapter 3 of the Are My Kids...
itunes:summary:
In this episode we talk about what empathy looks like, why it’s lacking, the stumbling blocks for empathy along with a close up look at narcissism and how to build more empathy in your kid.This episode is a companion to chapter 3 of the Are My Kids on Track book. Be sure to download the free supplemental small group questions here.
 
Connect with Sissy, David and Melissa @raisingboysandgirls
Connect with Sarah @sarahwbragg or her podcast here
description:
In this episode we talk about what empathy looks like, why it’s lacking, the stumbling blocks for empathy along with a close up look at narcissism and how to build more empathy in your kid.This episode is a companion to chapter 3 of the Are My Kids on Track book. Be sure to download the free supplemental small group questions here.

 

Connect with Sissy, David and Melissa @raisingboysandgirls

Connect with Sarah @sarahwbragg or her podcast here
content:encoded:
In this episode we talk about what empathy looks like, why it’s lacking, the stumbling blocks for empathy along with a close up look at narcissism and how to build more empathy in your kid.This episode is a companion to chapter 3 of the Are My Kids on Track book. Be sure to download the free supplemental small group questions here.

 

Connect with Sissy, David and Melissa @raisingboysandgirls
